title: The Floating World Emerges: Selections from the Clarence Buckingham Collection, Part I
short_description: Featuring the museum’s earliest and most famous ukiyo-e prints, or “pictures of the floating world,” this exhibition includes approximately 35 works dating from the late 17th to the first half of the 18th century.
